root.name: Firo & Klawd
root.description: Firo and Klawd was published by BMG Interactive and was released on the Playstation and the PC. It features an odd job alley cat named Klawd and an ape police detective called Firo. The game is about their quest to get to the bottom of a counterfeit dollar bill rig being set up in the city as in the beginning of the game, Klawd finds a suitcase full of money and buys a new catapult, not knowing that they are counterfeit bills. The game has multiple branches in which the story can be played, however they all end up at the same ending.
